channel.title: Posts on Tech notes from a lost developer
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Tech notes from a lost developer

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: This blog cannot start in any other way than with “Hello World!”. If you are not familiar with this 2-word phrase, it comes from the “test program” that everyone usually writes first when they start learning a new programming language. What will you find in this page? Hopefully articles about some tecnhnical stuff: programming, system administration, CI/CDâ€¦ I love to learn and try new technologies, so please don’t expect too much of this blog posts, because I just want to keep track of my experiences with some technologies and tools that are new to me at the moment: most of the posts will not be expert level, but probably a good place to start learning some technology with me.
